tagline: Very Serious Game : a simulation game not like the others...
name: Very Serious Game
body:
### Welcome to Very Serious Game Project
_Very Serious Game_ is a educational project proposed by the LORIA research laboratory and developed by Florian Greff and Benjamin FÃ¼hrmann, 2 students of the computering engineering school of TELECOM Nancy.
